metadata.title: CVE-2021-47048 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: spi:spi-zynqmp-gqspi: fix use-after-free in zynqmp_qspi_exec_op When handlingop->addr, it is using the buffer "tmpbuf" which has been freed. This willtrigger a use-after-free KASAN warning. Let's use temporary variables tostore op->addr.val and op->cmd.opcode to fix this issue.
